body.text: We have to use static HTML for example articles 2 and 3 because we want to AJAX pre-formatted HTML. Otherwise, we would have to include client side rendering in our "Infininte Content" plugin. We wanted to keep that plugin more simple and just AJAX in plain, rendered HTML, and parse vs trying to pull in JSON and do client side rendering (even though we could that if we decided to write the extra code)
